attributes.action: Rescue the UK couple who have been captured by Somali pirates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a couple in Somali who have been kidnapped by Somali pirates. They have been in captivity for 27 days now and are under threat of being killed in less than a week. Paul and Rachel Chandler, aged 59 and 55 and from Kent, were taken hostage by Somali gunmen on October 23 as they sailed their yacht in the Indian Ocean. Pirates have ransomed £4.3m to release them. I understand the government doesn't mix with kinappers but please could you find/do some thing to help them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
